title: Comic book reading among young people in the UK 2015 , by demographic
summary: This is a bar chart representing Demographic in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Demographic Boys and lowest at Demographic KS5.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Demographic is 19.6.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Demographic in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Demographic Boys has the highest Share of respondents and KS5 has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Demographic in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Demographic Boys and lowest at Demographic KS5.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Demographic is 19.6.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Demographic in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Demographic Boys has the highest Share of respondents and KS5 has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Demographic is 19.6.
The Demographic Boys has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Mixed, and KS2. Down to the Demographic KS5 which is the lowest.
The highest value 34.0 at Boys is almost 1.32 times larger than the average value 25.68.
Summing up the values of all Demographics, we get total 256.8.
